dialogues.speaker: player
dialogues.text: Hey, howdy, how's it going? It's been a while!

dialogues.speaker: villain
dialogues.text: Well, I can't believe I ran into you again. You're the second player I've encountered today.

dialogues.speaker: player
dialogues.text: Man, it's been a crazy few weeks with all the new villains in the area. I'm barely keeping ahead of the game.

dialogues.speaker: villain
dialogues.text: Oh? How many villains are there now?

dialogues.speaker: player
dialogues.text: Well, there are three new and I've recruited some to help with the fight. We'll be able to take down the city soon.

dialogues.speaker: villain
dialogues.text: That'll be nice. I want to take down this city so the surrounding villages can join my growing empire!

dialogues.speaker: player
dialogues.text: You know, I actually think we should wait and take down the city together. We'll be able to do it faster if more people join in.

dialogues.speaker: villain
dialogues.text: You're right. I'll send out an army to the other villages to convince them to join our cause. We'll be ready to take down this city in no time.

dialogues.speaker: player
dialogues.text: You know what, I've got a fun plan. Why don't we meet back here in a few weeks. If we managed to recruit any villagers, we'll take down

dialogues.speaker: villain
dialogues.text: Sure, we'll definitely want to take down the city together eventually.
